text: path_project character. Path project directory results saved. directory contain subdirectories marker gate tables, statistics, plots. directory created exist. .data GatingSet. flowWorkspace GatingSet object containing flow cytometry data stimulated unstimulated samples. GatingSet consistent channel names across samples include proper sample annotations. batch_list list. Named list element contains indices samples belonging batch/donor. Names used batch identification. Example: list(donor1 = 1:10, donor2 = 11:20). Proper batching crucial accurate background subtraction gate identification. marker list. List element specifies parameters gating specific marker. element list containing minimum channel name (e.g., list(cut = "IL2")). Additional marker-specific parameters can override global defaults. marker name match channel names GatingSet. pop_gate character vector. Population(s) within perform gating. Default "root" gate cells. Can specify populations like "CD3+" "CD4+" gates already exist GatingSet. bias_uns numeric. Bias adjustment unstimulated samples account background cytokine production. NULL (default), bias correction applied. Positive values shift unstimulated distribution higher, making gates conservative. Typically ranges 0.1 1.0 used. bias_uns_factor numeric. Multiplicative factor applied bias_uns. Default 1. Values > 1 increase bias effect, values < 1 decrease . provides fine-tuning bias correction. exc_min logical. Whether exclude minimum expression values analysis. Default TRUE. Minimum values often represent technical artifacts compensation spillover typically excluded. cp_min numeric. Minimum allowable cutpoint value. NULL (default), minimum enforced. Useful ensuring gates fall known technical thresholds background levels. bw_min numeric. Minimum bandwidth density estimation. NULL (default), bandwidth estimated automatically. Smaller values create detailed density estimates may noisier. Typical range 0.01 0.1 log-transformed data. min_cell numeric. Minimum number cells required reliable gating. Default 100. Samples fewer cells skipped provide sufficient statistical power accurate gate identification. max_pos_prob_x numeric. Maximum x-value (expression level) consider calculating positive probabilities. Default Inf (limit). Can used exclude extremely high expression values may represent doublets artifacts. gate_quant numeric vector. Quantiles used gate combination multiple gates identified. Default c(0.25, 0.75). method specified gate_combn determines quantiles used (e.g., minimum 25th percentiles). tol_clust numeric. Convergence tolerance clustering algorithms used gate refinement. Default 1e-7. Smaller values require precise convergence may increase computation time. gate_combn character. Method combining multiple gate candidates. Default "min" use conservative (lowest) gate. options may include "median" "max" depending desired stringency. marker_settings list. Optional list additional marker-specific settings override global defaults. element named marker name contain parameter overrides. Default NULL. calc_cyt_pos_gates logical. Whether calculate refined cytokine-positive gates using sophisticated algorithms. Default TRUE. FALSE, basic gates calculated, may less accurate faster. calc_single_pos_gates logical. Whether calculate single-positive gates individual markers addition combination gates. Default FALSE. Useful detailed analysis individual marker responses. debug logical.
